img_summary: The image showcases the in-game equipment menu, focusing on the "Guangmou Spirit," an epic item with the "Veiled Vipers" ability. This spirit allows players to summon venomous snakes to inflict Poison Damage on enemies, with an equipped effect that moderately boosts Poison Damage and Poison Resistance. The interface includes detailed stats, descriptions, and a demo preview of the ability in action.
